documents.title: 'escalated pressure ' at royal derby hospital
text: derby royal hospital says it 's experienced a period of escalated pressure over the new year period .
the recent icy weather along with winter treatments such as colds and helping those with breathing difficulties were the main reasons for the level of stress on the hospital .
they 're urging people to use other health care facilities such as walk-in centres where possible .
author: Andrew Strachan
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

text: steve mcclaren is eager to add to his derby county squad this month .

documents.title: second fire ruined family business
text: five months later in august a second fire on their farm destroyed another of the family 's buildings .
they used it to run a not-for-profit community project for people with disabilities and those with long-term unemployment .
they have now launched a crowd fundraising campaign to raise £ 15,000 to renovate a building for the high ashes rural community project .

Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: derby cathedral undergoes makeover
text: work to repair the roof of derby cathedral gets under way today .
the £ 750,000 restoration , will see the lead removed from the roof of the 18th century nave and a false ceiling installed to protect the interior below .
the work will not be completed until september this year .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your comments : 'infinity garden village '
text: plans to build a new village of more than 3,000 homes in south derbyshire has got you talking on our facebook page .
the settlement is one of the first wave of 'garden villages ' , given approval by the government .
lee harrold said : `` after living around stenson fields ( 30years ) we are moving in 2017 .
i enjoy being able to walk out my street , across wragley way and into the derbyshire countryside .
the continued expansion has destroyed it . ''
john walls said : `` garden villages were a concept as homes for heroes after the great war .
not too successful that time as economic reality stepped in . ''

vicky timmins also said : `` the money would be better spent refurbing all the disused shops in the city centre into flats - green belt going - we will need it for food in the future plus the wildlife has no voice ! ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: police car hit in borrowash cash point break-in
text: so far we know that derbyshire police were called to the nationwide building society just after 04:00 after witnesses reported a break-in .
police said the robbers drove a 4x4 into the window of the building in attempt to gain access to the cash machine .
an audi a3 and a transit van were seen driving away - the van then reversed into a police car .
a police spokesperson said two officers went to hospital for a check-up .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: robbers target cash point in borrowash
text: so you may have heard that thieves tried to steal money from a cash point in borrowash .
we tried to get more information on this yesterday but the police did not give us any details .
today we can tell you that derbyshire police are continuing to investigate after the failed robbery - which saw a 4x4 driven at the nationwide building society on monday .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: longest serving officer retires
text: derbyshire police are saying goodbye to one of their longest serving officers , ch supt jack atwall .
in his 30 years of service , he 's worked on cases such as the manslaughter of the six philpott children in allenton and the murder of tom webb in derby city centre .
he also received the the queen 's police medal in the new year honours .

documents.title: m1 fire : what 's happened so far
text: the fire on the m1 was aboard a lorry carrying 1,000 plastic crates of pre-packed food .
it happened at about 03:00 , initially closing all four lanes but two have since re-opened .
there are still severe delays and traffic is being diverted through nottingham , causing problems on the bus network during rush-hour .

BBC Local Live
